lQuestions.question: Sustainable development requires a fair distribution of goods and services among people in the world.
lQuestions.name: sustainable_development

lQuestions.question: I think that we need stricter laws and regulations to protect the environment.
lQuestions.name: environmental_laws

lQuestions.question: I avoid buying goods from companies with a bad reputation for looking after their employees and the environment.
lQuestions.name: company_reputation
